query:
ALTER TABLE supplierVerification 
ADD COLUMN isManuallyVerified INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN manualVerificationReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN manuallyVerifiedBy VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN manuallyVerifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PejtppQzUdF9US.e7bec8248b17 --database 2cukUCNz2S5THQpLSDbdYn --execute ALTER TABLE supplierVerification 
ADD COLUMN isManuallyVerified INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN manualVerificationReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN manuallyVerifiedBy VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN manuallyVerifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
